info.name: picture in picture
info.description: drawing pixelized video (or image) from channel 0  made of small videos (or images) from channel1.

renderpass.code:
void mainImage( out vec4 O, vec2 u )
{
    vec2  R = iResolution.xy,
          U = 20.*u/R.y,
          I = floor(U)/20., F = fract(U);
    
    O = ( mod(iTime,6.) > 3. 
           ? texture(iChannel0, I*R.y/R)   // target intensity 
           : texture(iChannel3, I*R.y/R) )   
        * texture(iChannel1, F)            // small video
        / texture(iChannel1, U, 99.)/2.;   // normalize small video
}
renderpass.name: Image
